projects.name: Hustl
projects.madeWith: React, Styled Components, Express, MongoDB, JWT
projects.description: a simple project tracker, similar in style to Trello. Features attractive design, with backlog, in-progress, and completed sections.

projects.name: rock the vote.
projects.madeWith: React, Styled Components, Express, MongoDB, bcrypt
projects.description: a web app that allows for users to make posts and comments focused on political discourse, with full CRUD functionality and authentication encryption.

projects.name: Keder?
projects.madeWith: React, Styled Components, Axios, React Router
projects.description: Keder? (Bored? in Danish), is a web app for boredom, with attractive, responsive design. allows for user to select most important category, and the app will send out an API request with specified parameters.

projects.name: goodcookie
projects.description: designed and styled an attractive, simple interface for a cookie-accepting site.
